remarks: Associative law for inner product.  Equation I2 of [Ponnusamy] p. 363. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipass.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipass.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ipass.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dipass $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A S B ) P C ) = ( A x. ( B P C ) ) ) $.
